chunks.text:
Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 12:06:09
Folder: CHHZBUC - fitra new distribution agreements
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CHHZBUC_00
From: Guillaume Cazin <Guillaume.Cazin@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Tala Harmalani <Tala.Harmalani@chalhoub.com>; Wael Kaedbey <Wael.Kaedbey@chalhoub.com>; Zeeshan Arif <Zeeshan.Arif@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2024-10-03 16:57
Subject: FW: FITRA New distribution agreements
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop, 

 

Hope you are well!

 

I received your contact information to discuss business insurance matters as we are currently in the process of renewing our contractual agreement with Lacoste.

 

One of the clauses pertains to our insurance policy. 

Could you kindly inform us of the cost implications for increasing our coverage from 1M EUR to 2M EUR?

 

If you are not the appropriate contact for this, could you please direct me to the right person in the Admin team? 

 

Thank you in advance for your assistance.

 

Best Regards,

Guillaume

 

 

ARTICLE 22 - INSURANCE  

22.1 The Distributor shall take out with a first-rate insurance company, and maintain in effect for the entire term of this Agreement, adequate insurance policies to cover both the risks of damage (fire, explosion, theft, water damages, riots, etc.) and those related to operating losses (including “supplier shortcomings”) at an appropriate guaranteed level. 

22.2 The Distributor shall take out, in its own name and with a first-rate insurance company, and shall maintain in effect during the entire term of this Agreement and the term during which the Lacoste Apparel shall be sold and/or present in the Territory (and for two (2) years following the expiry or termination of the Agreement), a Civil Operation Liability Insurance policy and a Civil Liability Insurance policy for products after delivery, for the Territory in a minimum guaranteed amount of two million euros (2,000,000 EUR*) per claim and per year, covering in particular any claim for physical injury, material and immaterial damage that may arise as a result of delivery, in which its liability would be incurred.

0 EUR*) per claim and per year, covering in particular any claim for physical injury, material and immaterial damage that may arise as a result of delivery, in which its liability would be incurred.

22.3 If requested, the Distributor shall submit to Lacoste Operations proof that it has taken out such insurance policies and regularly paid the premiums.

 

=>* FYI, in the old contract from 2012, the Civil Operation Liability Insurance policy and a Civil Liability Insurance policy for products after delivery requested was covering 1,000,000 EUR

 

	 

GUILLAUME CAZIN​​​​	
HEAD OF BRAND	
C.G.R. FZE	
DUBAI	
‑	
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES
